level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-95
level.text: For Law 16-95, see notes following ยง 8-671.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 12 of the Uniform Environmental Covenants Act.
